messages.title: STRAIGHT TALKING HARD WORKING FOR NOTTINGHAM NORTH
messages.content: Together we have successfully saved and improved our local college, planted thousands of trees in our communities, defended over a dozen bus routes that our community relies on, helped hundreds of local residents and championed UNHS staff.

messages.title: IT'S TIME TO DECIDE
messages.content: Vote Labour's Alex Norris, only Alex ticks all the boxes.

issues.education: successfully saved and improved our local college
issues.environment: planted thousands of trees in our communities

images.caption: A vote for anyone other than Alex risks letting the Tories in.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet presents a comparison chart of Labour's Alex Norris against other candidates, highlighting positive ticks for areas such as 'A local resident', 'Lives in our constituency', 'Record of improving our communities', but marking opposition candidates negatively.
